name: Tempus! Punch Your Way Out!
description:
Make your way through hungry alien beasts. Note yourself, sometimes it's worth investing in one decent punch to blow out a stubborn enemy. Anyway. The choice is yours. punch your way out!

Legacy Events

This game was created as part of the Totem Legacy Jam and features Legacy Events. Play the other games in the game jams to find out all the interactions!

  • secret doors you can open  if you get at least 50 points in Industry, Baby!
  • Jetpack you can get hare and use in protorun.
